decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the Amulet Titan combo by utilizing cards like Arboreal Grazer, Primeval Titan, and Amulet of Vigor. The deck focuses on ramping mana quickly through lands like Gruul Turf and Urza's Saga, allowing for explosive plays. The inclusion of cards like Dryad of the Ilysian Grove and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle provides additional utility and win conditions. The deck also includes specific lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Tolaria West to help protect and search for key combo pieces. Overall, the deck aims to efficiently combo off and overwhelm opponents with powerful threats.

The main concept of this deck is to build a fast and aggressive strategy centered around maximizing the power of multi-color creatures and spells. By utilizing powerful cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Scion of Draco, and Territorial Kavu, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creature aggression and direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames. The inclusion of Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding further enhances the deck's ability to control the board and protect its key creatures.

The deck is focused on disrupting and controlling the opponent's game plan through hand disruption, removal spells, and powerful creatures like Dauthi Voidwalker and Grief. The use of cards like Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, and Liliana of the Veil allows the player to pick apart their opponent's hand and board while slowly grinding out advantage. Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring up key artifacts like The Rack or Shadowspear. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent through attrition and resource denial, ultimately winning the game through sheer card advantage and control.

This deck focuses on utilizing Indomitable Creativity and Transmogrify to cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty by sacrificing smaller tokens generated by cards like Dwarven Mine and Wrenn and Six. The deck also includes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Persist to generate additional value and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its combination of combo pieces and control elements to create unexpected and powerful board states.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly through cards like Farseek and Sakura-Tribe Elder to cast an early Scapeshift, allowing the player to sacrifice lands and search for Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck also utilizes cards like Dryad of the Ilysian Grove and The One Ring to fix mana and ensure consistent land drops. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Worldsoul's Rage to control the board and protect the combo.

The deck focuses on using artifacts and control elements to generate value and disrupt the opponent's game plan. It utilizes Urza, Lord High Artificer to create mana and generate Thopter tokens with Thopter Foundry, while also benefiting from cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Esper Sentinel. The inclusion of Urza's Saga helps to tutor for key artifacts and maintain card advantage. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Portable Hole and Metallic Rebuke, while also having the ability to close out games with powerful equipment like Sword of the Meek and Shadowspear.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with high-impact creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Griselbrand, using cards like Solitude and Grief to disrupt the opponent's game plan. By utilizing instant reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate, the deck can bring back powerful creatures at instant speed to surprise the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Tainted Indulgence and Faithful Mending to dig for combo pieces and protect the key creatures. Prismatic Ending and Thoughtseize provide additional disruption against opposing threats. The mana base allows for flexibility and consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through disruption and removal spells, with a particular emphasis on graveyard interaction and sacrificing opponent's creatures. The deck utilizes cards like Sheoldred's Edict, Fatal Push, and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also utilizing cards like Grief and Dauthi Voidwalker to take advantage of the graveyard. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and The One Ring to close out the game. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes utility lands like Field of Ruin and Castle Locthwain.

This deck focuses on quickly gaining life through Martyr of Sands and using that life to power up cards like The One Ring and Abiding Grace. It also utilizes cards like Solitude and Skyclave Apparition to control the board and keep the opponent's threats in check. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Eagles of the North and Ranger-Captain of Eos while maintaining a strong defense with cards like Reprieve and Haywire Mite. Additionally, the deck has some land destruction elements with cards like Field of Ruin to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively and disrupting the opponent's game plan by using various creatures with evasion abilities, like Satoru, the Infiltrator and Dauthi Voidwalker, along with disruptive spells like Grief and Thoughtseize. The deck also includes powerful equipment like Sword of Fire and Ice and Batterskull to further enhance the aggression. Aether Vial helps to cheat creatures into play quickly, while Not Dead After All provides recursion for key creatures. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and disrupt the opponent's strategy to secure a quick victory.

The focus of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize and Wrench Mind, while also utilizing cards like Raven's Crime and Funeral Charm to control their resources. The deck looks to apply pressure with cards like The Rack and Shrieking Affliction, while locking down the opponent's creatures with Ensnaring Bridge. Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring for key artifacts, and Liliana of the Veil helps to control the board and disrupt the opponent's hand further. The deck aims to slowly grind out advantages and eventually overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage as quickly as possible. The key strategy involves using aggressive creatures like Scion of Draco and Territorial Kavu along with removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Lightning Bolt to control the board and push damage through. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's powerful spells and creatures, allowing for a fast and relentless assault on the opponent.
